trans-unit.source: Log on to a virtual machine running Windows Server
trans-unit.target: Log on to a virtual machine running Windows Server

trans-unit.source: Learn to use the Azure portal to log on to a virtual machine running Windows Server.
trans-unit.target: Learn to use the Azure portal to log on to a virtual machine running Windows Server.

trans-unit.source: You'll use the Connect button in the Azure portal to start a Remote Desktop session.
trans-unit.target: You'll use the Connect button in the Azure portal to start a Remote Desktop session.

trans-unit.source: (For Linux VMs, see <linkText>How to log on to a virtual machine running Linux</linkText><title></title>.)
trans-unit.target: (For Linux VMs, see <linkText>How to log on to a virtual machine running Linux</linkText><title></title>.)

trans-unit.source: Here are a few things to try quickly:
trans-unit.target: Here are a few things to try quickly:

trans-unit.source: For problems with the Remote Desktop connection, try resetting the configuration from the portal.
trans-unit.target: For problems with the Remote Desktop connection, try resetting the configuration from the portal.

trans-unit.source: From the virtual machine dashboard, under Quick Glance, click Reset remote configuration.
trans-unit.target: From the virtual machine dashboard, under Quick Glance, click Reset remote configuration.

trans-unit.source: For problems with your password, try resetting it from the portal.
trans-unit.target: For problems with your password, try resetting it from the portal.

trans-unit.source: From the virtual machine dashboard, under Quick Glance, click Reset password.
trans-unit.target: From the virtual machine dashboard, under Quick Glance, click Reset password.

trans-unit.source: If those don't work, you'll need to do more extensive troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: If those don't work, you'll need to do more extensive troubleshooting.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see <linkText>Troubleshoot Remote Desktop connections to a Windows-based Azure Virtual Machine</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see <linkText>Troubleshoot Remote Desktop connections to a Windows-based Azure Virtual Machine</linkText><title></title>.
